description: Demolition of existing buildings and structures and redevelopment to provide 83 residential units, 1,800 sqm. ground floor commercial (A1, A2, A3, D1 and D2) floorspace, associated access, landscaping, refuse, recycling facilities, 15 car parking spaces and alterations to the facade of Up The Creek and relocation of the Lord Hood PH beer garden.
